title: A New Republic
description: "Peace can't last forever."  With the Republic thrown into chaos, a new drug appears on the black market, based on a controlled sedative for a top pharmaceutical company. Agent Adi Bailek is brought in to uncover the identity of the leader heading this illegal drug industry.  Alongside her is Kia Antose, an old comrade from her days in the underground Rebel Accord which helped form the New Republic, but can they solve this case before the Republic collapses all together?  The first novel from the "Time" trilogy, written by Northern Irish author Jonathan McFerran.
author: Jonathan McFerran
